page.title: 03A Typical Day:continued.
page.content: 12.00:At school,I would be outside at play or inside at lunch. 13.00:Mum goes to work. 13.15:At school,we go back in to work. 15.15:School ends.I go home and let myself in,get something to eat and either watch T.V. or play with Angela. 16.00:Mum comes home and so does Suzanne. 16.30:Mum starts to cook tea. 17.30:Dad comes home and we have tea. 18.00:We are finishing tea,then Mum and Dad wash up. 19.30:We all watch T.V. until we go to bed. I go to bed at about 21.30 and so does Suzanne;Mum and Dad go to bed about 23.00.
